rooms.description: A welcoming entrance area with ample space for a small seating zone and reception desk.
rooms.vastu_note: Positioned towards the south-east to invite positive energy.

rooms.description: Contemporary open living room adjacent to the kitchen area; natural lighting from west windows.
rooms.vastu_note: Optimized for family gatherings with west exposure ensuring vibrant activity.

rooms.description: Functional dining space that can double as an informal area for guests.
rooms.vastu_note: Centrally located to promote social interaction.

rooms.description: Modern kitchen with energy-efficient appliances and a small pantry.
rooms.vastu_note: Placed in the north part of the ground floor for safety and fire precautions.

rooms.description: Dedicated home office with built-in storage and ample natural light from north windows.
rooms.vastu_note: North-east location encourages focus and productivity.

rooms.description: Compact servant's quarters with a small living space and bathroom.
rooms.vastu_note: Located in the northeast for balanced energy flow.

rooms.description: Utility room containing storage for cleaning supplies and garden tools.
rooms.vastu_note: Sited towards south-west ensuring minimal disturbance.

openings.description: Main entrance door with a vestibule to filter dust and noise.
Multiple windows ensuring cross ventilation on the ground floor.
